Bank Accounts, Credit Cards & Digital Tools

Check out our safe and secure checking accounts with free debit cards for everyday spending, plus rewarding credit cards, and helpful Online & Mobile Banking tools.

Get started Learn more

Bastion offers convenient, simple and free banking solutions that make your experience more valuable and rewarding. Choose from credit cards with low interest rates and cash back and checking accounts loaded with debit card rewards you can earn from everyday spending.

You can bank with us at any time, from anywhere with Bastions online and mobile banking solutions. If youd rather come in and bank face-to-face, were conveniently located near you. Can't make it into a branch? Schedule an appointment with a local Bastion team member in-person or over the phone.

Learn more about Bastion's credit cards with low interest, checking accounts, cash back rewards, and more by contacting us today!

Checking Accounts

Bastions checking accounts offer 24/7 account management with online bill pay, mobile deposit, account alerts, and more. Compare the benefits of each Bastion Checking Account to find the right one for you.

Teen Debit Accounts

Help your teenager get real world ready with a free debit card starting at age 13. Practice everyday saving and spending skills, and monitor activity in Online & Mobile Banking.

Compare Credit Cards

Choosing the credit card that makes financial sense is easy when you compare Bastion's Mastercard credit cards. You get low rates, security, and rewardsno matter which you choose.

Credit Card Rewards

Bastion offers a variety of credit card rewards and redemption options. Learn more about the types of rewards available and how to redeem.&nbsp;

Contactless Payments

Contactless payments make paying faster, easier, and more secure. Simply tap to pay with your Bastion debit or credit card at checkout when youre on-the-go.

Bank by Phone with Adel

Introducing Voice Banking With Adel! Get quick answers to common banking questions, complete account inquiries, and conduct routine transactions in a secure environment. Learn more!

Online &amp; Mobile Banking at Bastion

Bastion has digital banking tools to meet your needs. Deposit checks with your mobile device, pay bills online, check balances on the go, and more.

Bastion Express Banking

Bastion offers Express Banking Machines, letting customers transact conveniently and securely. Learn more about how our Express Banking offers more than the typical ATM.

Bastion Video Connect

Connect with us from the comfort of home with our secure, video banking tool. Chat face-to-face with a representative using your computer or mobile device. Learn more.&nbsp;

Online Appointment Scheduling

Book an appointment with a local Bastion Team member in-person or over the phone. We look forward to meeting with you!

Why Bank With Bastion Credit Union?

Our members enjoy great rates, lower fees, exclusive benefits, superior customer service, and so much more.

Superior Member Service

Bastion, we promise to go beyond merely meeting your banking needs to deliver a better experience with every interaction. Find out how we fulfill this promise every day.

Why Choose Bastion?

Bastion is a not-for-profit credit union that exists to serve the people, businesses, and neighborhoods of Greater Philadelphia, so they can prosper. We provide our members with all things banking, plus the educational resources and guidance to build and maintain financial security.

Heres why you should join us:

  • Better rates & low (or no!) fees
  • No tricks or hidden selling tactics
  • Personalized banking experiences, online & in-person
  • Open to anyone who lives or spends time in Southeast PA
  • All you need to do is open a savings account to join

Building Strength Together

Bastion is a not-for-profit credit union bank built on the unshakeable promise to serve those who work every day to build a better future for us all. For over 80 years, weve delivered a breadth of financial services, expert guidance, and innovative tools to help strengthen and grow businesses, families, and our local communities. We are your Bastion, and we are Building Strength Together.
